sentences.english: I wish you all, wherever you may be, a very happy Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 不论你们现时身在何处，我都祝愿你们圣诞快乐。

sentences.english: The virus EV71 is a common cause of HFMD.

sentences.english: She is presently the Chief Manager of Leisure and Cultural Services Department.

sentences.english: With girls nowadays it is no money, no honey.
sentences.chinese: 现时代的女孩子，无金钱即无爱情。

sentences.english: Some participants commented that there were too many corporate votes at present and thus proposed to increase individual votes.
sentences.chinese: 有些嘉宾认为现时团体票太多，建议增加个人票。
